question:
Consider the following statements about Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Human Resource Development
  2. The scheme aims to award annual scholarships to children of Standard VI to IX having good academic record and pursuing Philately as a hobby
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. The Deen Dayal SPARSH (Scholarship for Promotion of Aptitude & Research in Stamps as a Hobby) Yojana is an initiative under the Minister of Communications. <u>Second statement is correct.</u> Under the scheme of SPARSH (Scholarship for Promotion of Aptitude & Research in Stamps as a Hobby), it is proposed to award annual scholarships to children of Standard VI to IX having good academic record and also pursuing Philately as a hobby through a competitive selection process in all postal circles.
